scripts.deploy: npm run build&&aws s3 sync build/ s3://abbieongheen.com --delete
scripts.compress-illustration: magick mogrify -path src/img/illustrations/ -format jpg -strip -geometry x2000 -interlace Plane -gaussian-blur 0.02 -quality 90% src/img/illustrationsOG/*
scripts.compress-design: magick mogrify -path src/img/design/ -format jpg -strip -geometry x2000 -interlace Plane -gaussian-blur 0.02 -quality 90% src/img/designOG/*
